pages.text: $(li)The Maple Forest is a biome composed mainly of Autumn Trees.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find some vegetation, like differet kind of Maple Trees, Giant Brown Mushrooms and Giant Red Mushrooms.

$(li)Some animals like $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/crow)Crows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/autumnity/turkey)Turkeys$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/autumnity/snail)Snails$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Maple Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
